name: Shimmerwoods
description:
Go on a short but dangerous journey through the Shimmerwoods to meet some old friends. Your spirit friend will be there along side you to guide the way!

Shimmerwoods is a precision platformer where you try to traverse difficult terrain. Your spirit companion will help you in your darkest moments and urge you to move on. Will you be able to meet those long lost friends?

This game was made for the Narrative Driven Jam #9. The theme was Warm Feelings.
